LanguageData.AA_OcularWarping.label: ocular warping
LanguageData.AA_OcularWarping.description: The ocular priest will use one of the colony's ocular dryads to warp a creature into an ocular monster. Depending on the ritual's outcome and the sacrificed creature's body size, a correspondingly stronger ocular monster will be summoned.
LanguageData.AA_IdeoRole_OcularPriest.label: ocular priest
LanguageData.AA_IdeoRole_OcularPriest.description: A moral/spiritual leader who heads rituals and personally counsels believers.
LanguageData.AA_OcularTrees_Desired.label: desired
LanguageData.AA_OcularTrees_Desired.description: The strange alien gaze of the ocular trees is soothing.
LanguageData.AA_OcularTrees_Indifferent.label: indifferent
